#Brazil’s Bovespa stock index has just reached a milestone 100,000 points for the first time ever on intraday trading in Sao Paulo, keeps operating at all time high ahead of meeting between Bolsonaro and Trump.
Bovespa touches 100,000, making of history

The Bovespa index has exceeded 100k points for the first time ever. The milestone comes as investors closely follow the pension reform process in Congress. The bill is seen as the cornerstone of a more fiscally responsible state, making the country more attractive to investors.
